news.title: 读书社活动之---留学工作以及移民法律讲座
news.digest: 继去年成功与‘张哲瑞联合律师事务所’第一次举办‘留学工作以及移民’讲座，今年十月份CSSA读书会继续为大家带
news.content:
继去年成功与‘张哲瑞联合律师事务所’第一次举办‘留学工作以及移民’讲座，今年十月份CSSA读书会继续为大家带来一个实用而且收益留学生群体的---留学以及移民相关法律问题讲座。本次的主讲人为徐忠(Jane Xu)律师，来自张哲瑞联合律师事务所，是全美最大的华人律师事务所，在处理移民问题上很有经验。


这次讲座会涉及学生签证 F1, J-1 Waiver, OPT, H1B,NIW, EB-1A, EB-5及其他移民问题。对留学生，访问学者，快要毕业计划留美就业的同学，以及正在工作准备申请绿卡的校友都很有帮助。同时也欢迎各位同学，学者提出自己的疑问，对于未来毕业之后的规划做好准备。


时间: 下午1点到3点，10月29日，星期六

主讲人: Jane Xu律师 (jxu@hooyou.com)

地点：LSU Student Union, Room 329


讲座免费入场，但是需要准备来的同学和校友点击下面的链接进行提前注册。我们读书会也会根据人数准备丰富的零食饮料等。如果哪位同学、学者想单独咨询徐律师，可以发邮件（(jxu@hooyou.com)）预约。


网上注册:

http://survey.constantcontact.com/survey/a07edadsxgmitugbv0k/start


如果需要接送，或者有其他关于活动举办的疑问，请联系刘同学，Phone: (225) 933-9578， Wechat：1047302695


CSSA   读书会


CSSA-Career Department Workshop Lecture (移民讲座)

An Immigration Seminar by Attorney Jane Xu

Free seminar at Louisiana State University

Date and Time:  Saturday October 29, 2016, 1:00 pm-3:00 pm

Location: LSU student union room 329


Main contents: OPT, EB-1A and EB-1B Green Card; National Interest Waivers; PERM; H-1B visa, quota and strategies; F2A Filings.


Presenter:  Co-managing Attorney Jane Xu: jxu@hooyou.com


Online registration: http://survey.constantcontact.com/survey/a07edadsxgmitugbv0k/start


Contact Person: Haoran Liu  Phone: (225) 933-9578       


                                      


 Zhang & Associates P.C. is the largest Chinese-American law firm and the second largest immigration law firm in the U.S. Co-Managing Attorney Jane Xu will deliver free legal seminar to all the Chinese students and scholars at your school, providing you with immigration legal knowledge and other legal knowledge. The lecture is free to the public and our firm will provide refreshments for the participants.


 


I sincerely believe that our new cooperation will be greater. If you would like to have more information on the lecture or any question, please do not hesitate to contact me.


请关注主持我们的Facebook主页：www.facebook.com/LSUCSSA

• 微信公众平台：CSSALSU

路易斯安那州立大学中国学生学者联谊会

Chinese Students and Scholars Association (CSSA)

at Louisiana State University (LSU)
